ScenarioVerifierAdded(address).details: Event emitted when a Scenario Verifier is added

ScenarioVerifierDeleted(address).details: Event emitted when a Scenario Verifier is deleted

ScenarioVerifierDisabled(address).details: Event emitted when a Scenario Verifier is disabled

ScenarioVerifierEnabled(address).details: Event emitted when a Scenario Verifier is enabled

ScenarioVerifierUpdated(address,address).details: Event emitted when a Scenario Verifier is updated

params.scenarioVerifierAddress: Address of the new scenario verifier
Address of the scenario verifier to delete
Address of the scenario verifier to disable
Address of the scenario verifier to enable
Address of the scenario verifier to check

params.index: The index of the verifier in the list

params.newOwner: The address of the thing owner

params.user: The address of the user to check

returns._0: isUserAllowed True if the user is allowed, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newScenarioVerifierAddress: Address of the new scenario verifier
params.oldScenarioVerifierAddress: Address of the existing scenario verifier

addScenarioVerifier(address).notice: Adds a new scenario verifier to the entrypoint

deleteScenarioVerifier(address).notice: Deletes a scenario verifier from the entrypoint

getIsScenarioEnabled(address).notice: Gets if a scenario is enabled

getScenarioVerifierAddress(uint256).notice: Gets the address of a scenario verifier by index

isAllowedForEntrypoint(address).notice: Checks if a user is allowed for the entrypoint

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the registration, update, and verification of Scenario Verifiers for a single project
